name: Breakout (itch) (Bloomy)
description:
Hello and thank you for taking the time to check out my game.

Breakout is a classic arcade game in which you have to move your paddle left and right to destroy all the bricks with the ball. Once all the bricks have been destroyed you can move onto the next level.

There are 6 levels in total, ranging from easy to very hard.

I really hope you enjoy my game. If you have any feedback/improvements then please leave them in the comments and I will implement them in the game.

CONTROLS:

Movement - A&D keys or left and right arrow keys

Shoot Ball - Space

Restart Level - R

Return To Main Menu: ESC
